mapper.sql: EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS , SALARY, ENROLL_DATE, RETIRE_DATE, WORK_STATUS , GENDER, JOB_CODE, DEPT_CODE, BRANCH_CODE
E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE ,E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE ,E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME ,E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE WORK_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow} ) AS E LEFT JOIN tbl_job J ON E.job_code = J.job_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department D ON E.dept_code = D.dept_code LEFT JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.branch_code = B.branch_code

SELECT DISTINCT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE WORK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS E LEFT JOIN tbl_job J ON E.job_code = J.job_code LEFT JOIN tbl_department D ON E.dept_code = D.dept_code LEFT JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.branch_code = B.branch_code WHERE 1=1
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%')
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deptName}, '%')
AND B.BRANCH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchName}, '%')
SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE WORK_STATUS = 'Y' AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT('19', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 1, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 3, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 5, 2)), '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{monthValue}

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 1, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 3, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 5, 2)), '%y-%m-%d')) >= #{monthValue} ORDER BY MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 1, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 3, 2), '-', SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 5, 2)), '%y-%m-%d')) ASC

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.EMP_REG, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_job J ON E.job_code = J.job_code JOIN tbl_department D ON E.dept_code = D.dept_code JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.branch_code = B.branch_code WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND WORK_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE GENDER = #{gender} AND WORK_STATUS = 'Y'
